---
title: "Este es el título principal del documento"
subtitle: 'Subtítulo del documento'
author: "Daniel E. de la Rosa"
date: "`r format(Sys.Date(), '%B %d, %Y')`"
output:
  bookdown::html_document2: 
    toc: true
    number_sections: true
    css: ['rmdx/custom_css.css', 'rmdx/current_project.css']
    highlight: 'pygments'
    includes:
      after_body: ['rmdx/footer.html', 'rmdx/js_scripts.html']
  html_notebook:
    toc: true
    number_sections: true
    css: ['rmdx/custom_css.css', 'rmdx/current_project.css']
    highlight: 'pygments'
    includes:
      after_body: ['rmdx/footer.html', 'rmdx/js_scripts.html']
  officedown::rdocx_document:
    toc: true
    highlight: 'pygments'
    reference_docx: rmdx/base.docx
    tables:
      style: Table
      layout: autofit
      width: 1.0
      caption:
        pre: 'Table '
        sep: ': '
      conditional:
        first_row: true
        first_column: false
        last_row: false
        last_column: false
        no_hband: false
        no_vband: true
    plots:
      style: Normal
      align: center
      caption:
        style: Image Caption
        pre: 'Gráfico '
        sep: ': '
    lists:
      ol.style: null
      ul.style: null
    mapstyles:
      Normal: ['First Paragraph', 'Author', 'Date']
    reference_num: true
  bookdown::pdf_document2:
    toc: true
    includes:
      in_header: "rmdx/preamble.tex"
    latex_engine: xelatex
    
params:
  exclude_r_in: c('docx')
    
toc-title: 'Tabla de contenido'
fig_caption: true
always_allow_html: true
bibliography: 'rmdx/bibliography.bib' 
nocite: '@*' 
knit: (
        function(inputFile, encoding) { 
          rmarkdown::render( 
            input         = inputFile,
            output_format = c(
            "bookdown::html_document2",
            "officedown::rdocx_document",
            "bookdown::pdf_document2"),
            encoding      = encoding, 
            output_yaml = 'rmdx/output.yml',
            output_file   = c(
            'Html document',
            'Word document',
            'PDF document')
          ) 
        }
      )
